response_parsed.title: Unit Testing Edge Runtimes with FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide explains how to unit test edge runtimes using FastAPI in Python 3.12+, demonstrating best practices and essential steps for a seamless testing experience.
key_points: Understanding the importance of unit testing in FastAPI applications
Setting up the project structure for testing with Python 3.12+
Utilizing FastAPI's built-in test client to make requests
Using pytest for organizing tests and asserting responses

code_examples.code:
def test_main():

version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this guide.

caveats: This guide does not cover testing edge runtime-specific functionality.
